pullRequest.title: [paradoxalarm] Limit maximum zones and partitions with new parameters and more channels added to partition thing
pullRequest.bodyText:
As described in the subject these are two small features in this PR:

Added two new parameters to bridge which now limit the maximum number of partitions and zones that are read from the system. This is a performance enhancement when there are not too many configured zones and user does not need to pull all of them.
Because the amount of parameters that come from the configuration of the bridge become too many, now in communicator creation a Builder pattern has been used instead of direct creation using a constructor.
Deprecated the consolidated "additionalStates" channel which was pretty much serialized all additional states (different from armed, disarmed and "in alarm") with comma separated format. Now all these states are directly published in partition thing type as separate channels.

Cheers,
Konstantin

commit.message:
Implementation of maxZones and maxPartitions parameters

* Reworked creation of EvoCommunicator to use builder pattern
* Added support for additional, non-mandatory parameters maxZones and
maxPartitions which limit the maximum amount of zones and partitions
that are used during refresh.
* Changed Factory to create builder instead of communicator
* Renamed classes to represent properly the new object creation design

Signed-off-by: Konstantin Polihronov <polychronov@gmail.com>

Fix build errors

* Fix headers
* Fix thread unsafe singleton

Signed-off-by: Konstantin Polihronov <polychronov@gmail.com>

Implement separate states as channels for partitions

Signed-off-by: Konstantin Polihronov <polychronov@gmail.com>

Add channels to partition.xml

Signed-off-by: Konstantin Polihronov <polychronov@gmail.com>

Fixed duplicate channel issue

Signed-off-by: Konstantin Polihronov <polychronov@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            | maxPartitions     | Non mandatory parameter which sets maximum partitions to use during refresh. If not set, maximum allowed amount from panelType will be used.|
          
          
            
            | maxPartitions     | Optional parameter which sets maximum partitions to use during refresh. If not set, maximum allowed amount from panelType will be used.|
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -36,6 +36,8 @@ Currently binding supports the following panels: EVO192, EVO48(not tested), EVO9
 | port              | The port used for data communication. Default value is 10000.|
 | panelType         | Not mandatory. Will be used if discovery does not identify the panel. Otherwise provide EVO48, EVO96, EVO192, etc...|
 | reconnectWaitTime | Value is in seconds. The time to wait before a reconnect occurs after socket timeout.|
+| maxPartitions     | Non mandatory parameter which sets maximum partitions to use during refresh. If not set, maximum allowed amount from panelType will be used.|

nodes.bodyText: I would prefer to keep the old constructor pattern (with scope private)

commit.message:
Changes based on J-N-K's review

* All label words now start with upper case char
* Use "optional" instead of non-mandatory in README for parameters
* Log in one line the fields initialized in EvoCommunicator constructor
* Mark deprecated channel in description instead of label
* Change constructor signature in EvoCommunicator back to multiple
arguments instead of using the builder as an argument

Signed-off-by: Konstantin Polihronov <polychronov@gmail.com>

Updates in README file

* Added channel documentation for zones and partitions
* Added disclaimer
* Added acknowledgements to other people's work which eased creation of
binding
* Added information that the binding does not support active
arming/disarming
* Removed wrong comment in bridge handler

Signed-off-by: Konstantin Polihronov <polychronov@gmail.com>
